body: Why there's a Miku-da-yo on the last page. Not complaining tho

I like it how he immediately switches over to Leafa when he finds out that his gf is a thot. Instead of those other NTR doujins where most MC either end up in despair, premature ejaculate or have a mental shutdown. This guy here is actually pretty witty.
Finally a smart male in these NTR doujins.
